property.name: nfs.server.port
property.description: Specify the port number used by Hadoop NFS. Notice that the default value here is different than the default Hadoop nfs port 2049 specified in hdfs-default.xml. 2049 is also the default port for Linux nfs. The setting here allows starting Hadoop nfs for testing even if nfs server (linux or Hadoop) is aready running on he same host.

property.name: nfs.mountd.port
property.description: Specify the port number used by Hadoop mount daemon. Notice that the default value here is different than 4242 specified in hdfs-default.xml. This setting allows starting Hadoop nfs mountd for testing even if the Linux or Hadoop mountd is already running on the same host.
